name: Outro
_source: victory_screen
transition;close
music;Jezaille Brett ~ Elegance... and Excellence
change_background;Inside House 2 Daytime
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;Emeline;Left;Cornelius;Right
speak;Emeline;We recovered the funds.|Turns out a scoundrel in the church colluded with them!
speak;Cornelius;What a repugnant sinner.
speak;Emeline;Now, Father.|What did you wish to speak about?
speak;Cornelius;Ah, yes.|I believe that Archbishop Jeremiah is...|To put it bluntly, unsuitable.
speak;Emeline;What? What has he done?
speak;Cornelius;The man is a former mercenary and gambling addict.
speak;Emeline;Father, I don't believe we should judge-
speak;Cornelius;I have no issue with that, though... he has a major alcohol problem.|Several dozen bottles of rum recovered from his office, empty.
speak;Emeline;How terrible...
speak;Cornelius;Frankly, he is too enamored with worldly pleasures.|One with cardinal virtue... such as myself.
speak;Emeline;You, Father?|I suppose that makes sense...|You have given me great aid with the divine...|It's settled, I'll tell the news to the Archbishop.
speak;Cornelius;Wonderful, though we must rehabilitate the poor soul...
speak;Emeline;Of course, he will need a temporary absence.
speak;Cornelius;Thank you, your Majesty.|I will not shirk my responsibility and use my power for the Goddess's benefit!|Now, how were the little ones?
if;game.check_dead('Dark') and game.check_dead('Lumii') and game.check_dead('Howai')
speak;Emeline;None of them made it...|I feel so... *Sniff*
speak;Cornelius;How cruel indeed...|I should have known better than to listen to the rugrats...|Though remember, stay strong of heart, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;Of course...
elif;game.check_dead('Dark') or game.check_dead('Lumii') or game.check_dead('Howai')
speak;Emeline;Not all of them made it...|I feel so... *Sniff*
speak;Cornelius;How cruel indeed...|I should have known better than to listen to the rugrats...|Though remember, stay strong of heart, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;Of course...
else
speak;Emeline;They did well! I was surprised at their magical talent!
speak;Cornelius;A reflection of the orphanage's teachings.|How marvellous that they flourished under the Goddess's guidance!
speak;Emeline;I'm so proud of them!
end
speak;Cornelius;I also had further matters to discuss.|With reports of Prince Sages within our borders...|Palushin has enforced an embargo.
speak;Emeline;Sir Skill is trying his hardest to track them down...|Wait, an embargo? We rely on their metals for our weaponry!
speak;Cornelius;They don't wish to endanger their merchants.
speak;Emeline;King Jevil...
speak;Cornelius;More concerning, is Monsdor is delayed in transporting King Sages.
speak;Emeline;Why? Can't they hurry it up?!
speak;Cornelius;I believe they had additional prisoners to attend to.|Allies of the Prince.
speak;Emeline;They seek to earn our trust, with Helia due to be wed...|Yet are keeping us waiting.
speak;Cornelius;If I may speak plainly, your Majesty.|I believe your uncle is involved.
speak;Emeline;Ah! So, my fears aren't mine alone.|It troubles me that he does so much without consulting me...
speak;Cornelius;His soul will be judged.|I am further concerned by hearsay of necromancy.
speak;Emeline;Where?
speak;Cornelius;Among the ranks of Monsdor.|I have witnesses waiting to testify, hold a moment.
remove_portrait;Cornelius
speak;Emeline;Uncle, what could you be scheming... You bastard...|{c:expression;Emeline;CloseEyes}Ngh... I feel so... strange...{c:expression;Emeline;NormalBlink}
move_portrait;Emeline;FarLeft
multi_add_portrait;Cornelius;MidLeft;Hogarth;MidRight;Nabin;FarRight
speak;Cornelius;Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest, Grahment territory.
speak;Hogarth;Ah, charmed to make your acquaintance, your Majesty!|...{c:wait;400} Son...
speak;Nabin;Apologies. Glad to meet you, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;You reported... monsters?
speak;Hogarth;A most terrible thing!|They terrorised my region!|A few brave souls vanquished the foes.
speak;Nabin;Bah.
speak;Hogarth;Hush, son.
speak;Emeline;What is it?
speak;Nabin;Oh, nothing.|He just didn't think brave of them before.
speak;Hogarth;Well... they were most opposed to Aurelia!|As a true servant of the Goddess... it was a shame.
speak;Cornelius;These brave souls reportedly were allies of Prince Sages.
speak;Emeline;It feels as though the walls are closing in on me...|If Monsdor are being underhanded too... our allies grow thinner.

speak;Hogarth;That is why I am here.|Arcei's throne sits empty, the region is destabilsed.|Ruffians run amok, a poor sight indeed...|With Aurelia's holy blessing...|I wish to take the seat in the King's absence.
speak;Emeline;Monsdor did not install any leader?
speak;Hogarth;It appears they are of a one-track mind.|They have might, but no political savvy.
speak;Nabin;Father, will the Arcein commoners really fall in line?
speak;Hogarth;They will appreciate us when we overturn the bandit infestation.|We will also provide support for you, too.|Arcei's fertile land is ripe for agriculture.
speak;Emeline;While I care not for a land of sinners...|I would appreciate the trade.|I give you my support, Duke.
speak;Hogarth;Splendid, let this be the start of a fruitful alliance.|Come, Nabin, we must make our departure.
speak;Nabin;Yes, father.
speak;Hogarth;It's been an honour, your Majesty.
multi_remove_portrait;Hogarth;Nabin
speak;Cornelius;That man seems like a foul serpent.|He's clearly using us, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;I know.|He might be a low-lifed wretch, using us for status...|However, a useful low-life at that.
speak;Cornelius;How so?

speak;Emeline;I can hardly trust anyone these days.|Other than Sir Skill and you, Cornelius.|Grahment seems at odds internally as to who supports us.|Monsdor appears to be underhanded and unholy...|While Palushin wants to cut off our trade?
speak;Cornelius;What is our course of action?

speak;Emeline;I cannot trust anyone...|Though if Grahment and Monsdor remain on rocky terms...|They'll be in no shape to take advantage of me...|I won't allow anyone to use me...{c:expression;Emeline;CloseEyes} Ngh...{c:expression;Emeline;NormalBlink}
speak;Cornelius;Your Majesty? Is everything alright?
speak;Emeline;I'm fine! Not weak! I can handle this!
speak;Cornelius;In that case, I wish to take todays squadron on a mission.
speak;Emeline;Yes?
speak;Cornelius;I wish for them as escorts, so I can seek audience with King Oberon.|For your own sake, I must ascertain the loyalties of Monsdor.|Including any potential sacrelige and foul play...
speak;Emeline;Thank you...|I will contact King Jevil, pressure him to relinquish the embargo.|I know Argento can hold down the fort for me.|I may also bring Dawn with me on a rendezvous, perhaps...
speak;Cornelius;Clever, the less time she has around your uncle...|The less his foul grasp will taint her.
speak;Emeline;I will have your promotion ready at once.|Then, good luck.
speak;Cornelius;Thank you, your Majesty.|However, with the grace of the Goddess on my side..|I need no luck!
transition;close
change_team;Emeline;enemy
